title: BBQ salmon sandwich with lemon dill mayo
ingredients: ['4 rashers streaky bacon', '1 (450g) fillet salmon, cut into 2 portions', '1 tablespoon olive oil', '5 tablespoons mayonnaise', '1 teaspoon dried dill', '1 teaspoon freshly grated lemon zest', '4 slices good, crusty bread, toasted', '4 slices tomato', '2 lettuce leaves']
